descriptions:
['DescriptionBerkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties is delighted to present for sale, this beautiful Colonial styled Villa Mansion situated on the prestigious Golf Estate of Emirates Hills. Upon arrival, a two hundred and fifty piece Swarovski chandelier features in the grand entrance hall. An immaculately presented Villa with a BUA spanning over approximately 23,000 sq.ft. and plot size 38,526.94 sq.ft.
Built over two floors with an internal lift and sweeping staircase, this seven bedroom Villa is located in one of the more private cul-de-sacs on the Estate. Offering three reception rooms, three kitchens and two dining rooms, balconies off most of the bedrooms with views looking out over the garden below and Dubai skyline. Two bedrooms have their own private lounge and large walk-in wardrobe area. The master bedroom en-suite bathroom has a bath-jacuzzi with gold taps and gold handles. Separate study. An immaculately landscaped and lush garden that wraps around the entire property. The garden is further complimented by a sparkling swimming pool and private detached outside entertainment area with an enclosed dining area. An entertainer’s dream. 
Garage and additional under cover parking provide ample space for multiple cars. Maid and driver’s room both en-suite.
Call our Specialist on +971504127168 to find out more about this Luxury Villa.']

["DescriptionLUXHABITAT is proud to present what can only be one of the best JBR units available in the market today. This spacious apartment is located on the corner of a high floor in the Rimal 2 building which is located on the very front line with zero obstructions blocking the views directly to the open ocean, Palm Jumeirah and the stunning new Bluewaters Island featuring Dubai's latest landmark Ain Dubai which will be the largest Ferris wheel in the world when opened shortly.
Upgraded and fully furnished this stunning property comes with real wood parquet floors and luxury wall coverings throughout and is tastefully furnished with designer furniture and appliances.
Call LUXHABITAT today to arrange a private viewing of this ultra-prime JBR unit, which is being sold vacant on possession ready to move in.
Jumeirah Beach Residence (also known as JBR) is a 1.7 kilometres (1.1 mi) long, 2 square kilometres (0.77 sq mi) gross floor area waterfront community located against the Persian Gulf in Dubai Marina in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is a residential development and contains 40 towers (35 are residential and 5 are hotels). JBR can accommodate about 15,000 people, living in its apartments and hotel rooms. The project has 6,917 apartments, from 900 sq ft (84 m2) studios to 5,500 sqft (510 m2) penthouses. JBR has a total of six residential blocks, Shams, Amwaj, Rimal, Bahar, Sadaf, and Murjan (in order from east to west). It is located within walking distance to Dubai Marina, Dubai Tram, and Dubai Metro.
The developer, Dubai Properties (a subsidiary of Dubai Holding), launched JBR in August 2002. This 6 billion dirham project was completed in 2010."]
